ai-patthana8.27:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.27:1.1_0: the principle not totally given up conceit.
ai-patthana8.27:1.1_1: the principle not to give rise to diversity of things.
ai-patthana8.27:1.1_2: ties of conceit are not given up.
ai-patthana8.27:2.1_0: the principle not to give rise to diversity of things.
ai-patthana8.27:3.1_0: Nor is a cause of ties. It doesn’t give rise to the thought that gives rise to thoughts.
ai-patthana8.27:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
